pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Echinacea + Astragalus 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Used in Traditional Chinese Medicine to strengthen lungs, support immune system health, maintain vitality and tonify Qi.

Wanderlust Echinacea + Astragalus is a consciously created blend of plant actives. Echinacea is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to support the immune system to fight illness. Astragalus is used in Traditional Chinese Medicine to strengthen lungs, support immune system health, maintain vitality and tonify Qi.

Size: 60 Capsules

Warnings

Talk to a TCM practitioner/health professional if you are unsure if this medicine is right for you.

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
Echinacea purpurea (Organic Echinacea) herb ext. dry conc. 208.33 mg Derived from dry------------1.25g
Astragalus membranaceus (Organic Astragalus) root ext. dry conc. 225 mg Derived from dry------------4.5g

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours.
Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Take one capsule two times daily, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry
place. Do not use if cap seal or
inner seal is missing or broken.
